Okay I see a lot of you have commented on this, and it seems like most of you see this as a doujin as its own, but there is a "story" behind it (the story was absolutely nonsense but let still call it one) and since most of you can't read it because its Chinese I will give you a short summary of what happened. So in ancient china there is a small town, the small town is extremely poor and guess what when people are all poor? There are more thief and bandits than any other places, and then the girl and 6 other people were the leaders of a group of bandits. And of course they are bandits and the local military needs to start taking actions, while they were fighting this girl and the 6 other people captured the 4 wives of the local military's captain and then they brutally killed them, cleared out their organs and put the head, arms, legs and bodies in separate buckets and just left it in the wild, and then the captain captured them and this is what happened next
Y'all are weak
